meanings.definition: Firm in purpose or intent; determined.
meanings.sent1: She was resolved to finish her homework before bedtime.
meanings.sent2: The team showed a resolved effort to win the game.
meanings.sent3: His resolved attitude made him a reliable team player.
meanings.sent4: Her resolved mind was like a steady compass guiding her decisions.
meanings.sent5: The resolved look in her eyes showed her unwavering determination.

meanings.sent1: After much discussion, they finally reached a resolved agreement.
meanings.sent2: The matter was resolved peacefully through mediation.
meanings.sent3: Their resolved decision brought an end to the debate.
meanings.sent4: The resolved issue allowed them to move forward with their plans.
meanings.sent5: The resolved outcome brought a sense of closure to the situation.

meanings.sent1: The resolved puzzle revealed a hidden picture.
meanings.sent2: The mystery was resolved when the detective found the missing clue.
meanings.sent3: The resolved case left everyone surprised by the unexpected twist.
meanings.sent4: The resolved problem paved the way for a smooth project completion.
meanings.sent5: The resolved conflict brought peace to the community.
